docblock.long-description: The process is implemented in subclasses.
The default is the end of the command namespace. If you need to customize, please override it with subclasses.
The default is Log::LEVEL_DEBUG. If you need to customize, please override it with subclasses.
If you need to customize the handling of errors, please override it with subclasses.
If no key is specified, all command arguments are returned.

tag.name: param
tag.description: default value if there is no value specified in the key

docblock.long-description: If no key is specified, all command options are returned.

tag.name: param
tag.description: default value if there is no value specified in the key

docblock.long-description: Excluded when parsing the controller namespace. Used in running web applications.
Called if the controller is not specified. If unspecified, the default is 'index'. Used in running web applications.
Called when the controller is not found. Used in running web applications.

docblock.description: Parse the controller namespace from the request path

tag.name: return
tag.description: controller information array( controller class instance, controller namespace, path arguments )

tag.name: throws
tag.description: thrown when the command class is not found.

docblock.description: Parse the command namespace from the command line argument

docblock.long-description: An array of configuration values loaded from the configuration file.

Load the configurations from CONFIG_DIR/config-config-$env.php. If the environment is not specified, load the configurations from CONFIG_DIR/config.php. Environment-independent configurations are defined in CONFIG_DIR/config-common.php.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: thrown when the configuration file does not exist

docblock.long-description: If no key is specified, all configurations are returned.

tag.name: param
tag.description: default value if there is no value specified in the key
